tutorial_talks.content: {DESI}! I've discovered a new phenomenon, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: What is it, Dr. Mog?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_surprise

tutorial_talks.content: You might not believe this, kupo, but it's possible for characters to roam to other, parallel worlds!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: You're right, I don't believe it! I also don't really understand it.
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi

tutorial_talks.content: Well, kupo, it turns out that there are other worlds out there where other people are restoring other Records!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: That's a lot of "others"!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_sad

tutorial_talks.content: Indubitably, kupo! Imagine, millions of other keepers, and other Dr. Mogs, just like us!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: That's kinda frightening!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_surprise

tutorial_talks.content: Don't worry, they're perfectly harmless, kupo. In fact, we'll never have to actually meet them face-to-face.
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: But I've found that, through the paintings, it's possible to share Records with them!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: So...what does that mean, exactly?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi

tutorial_talks.content: It means that you could borrow a Hero Record from another you in a parallel world, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: I call the heroes that cross worlds "Roaming Warriors," kupo.
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Summon a Roaming Warrior and you can use their Soul Break! The pinnacle of their power, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Wow, I'll use that in every battle!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_surprise

tutorial_talks.content: Er, about that, kupo. You can only use this power twice per dungeon.
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: And you can't be sure you'll be able to find the same world each time...
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Unless you Follow the other keeper, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: That will let you access the keeper of your choice once a day, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: You can follow up to 100 keepers, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: That's quite a lot!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi

tutorial_talks.content: Oh, kupo! I should also mention that Roaming works both ways.
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: You can set your own characters as Roaming Warriors to help out people in other worlds, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: You don't even have to go to the Party screen to do it, either, kupo! Just pick it on your Profile!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Oh, and you can even equip the character you choose with things your other characters have equipped, kupo! Easy!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Best of all, if your Roaming Warrior gets summoned, you get paid in gil, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Wait, does that mean I have to pay gil when I summon someone else's character?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_surprise

tutorial_talks.content: Nope! You don't have to pay a single gil, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Sounds like a win-win!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_laugh

tutorial_talks.content: Because it is, kupo! Now, get back to rescuing Records, with a little otherworldly help!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle
